original_text: The beasts of the field cry also unto thee: for the rivers of waters are dried up, and the fire hath devoured the pastures of the wilderness.
korean_text: 들짐승도 주를 향하여 헐떡거리오니 시내가 다 말랐고 들의 풀이 불에 탔음이니이다

sentences.original_text: The beasts of the field cry also unto thee
for rivers of waters are dried up
and fire hath devoured pastures of the wilderness
